dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4580 IH: Improving Clinical Care Workforce for Our Vets Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Schiff (for himself, Mr. Honda, Mr. Walz, and Mr. Van Hollen) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to modify authorities relating to the collective bargaining of employees in the Veterans Health Administration.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Improving Clinical Care Workforce for Our Vets Act.

section.header: Modification of authorities on collective bargaining of employees of the Veterans Health Administration
section.text: Section 7422 of title 38, United States Code, is amended—
